aws_sns_topic_subscription.description: Provides a resource for subscribing to SNS topics.

topic_arn.description: The ARN of the SNS topic to subscribe to

protocol.description: The protocol to use. The possible values for this are: `sqs`, `sms`, `lambda`, `application`. (`http` or `https` are partially supported, see below

endpoint.description: The endpoint to send data to, the contents will vary with the protocol. (see below for more information)

endpoint_auto_confirms.description: Boolean indicating whether the end point is capable of [auto confirming subscription](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/sns/latest/dg/SendMessageToHttp.html#SendMessageToHttp.prepare

confirmation_timeout_in_minutes.description: Integer indicating number of minutes to wait in retying mode for fetching subscription arn before marking it as failure. Only applicable for http and https protocols (default is 1 minute).

raw_message_delivery.description: Boolean indicating whether or not to enable raw message delivery (the original message is directly passed, not wrapped in JSON with the original message in the message property

filter_policy.description: JSON String with the filter policy that will be used in the subscription to filter messages seen by the target resource. Refer to the [SNS docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sns/latest/dg/message-filtering.html

delivery_policy.description: JSON String with the delivery policy (retries, backoff, etc.

topic_arn.description: The ARN of the topic the subscription belongs to

endpoint.description: The full endpoint to send data to (SQS ARN, HTTP(S) URL, Application ARN, SMS number, etc.)

arn.description: The ARN of the subscription stored as a more user-friendly property
